level.heading: POWER - No creation of an entitlement.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to create any entitlement to POWER benefits or to confer on any person or family any entitlement to POWER benefits.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 4(h) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-241
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.
